full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DIR RDO RJE MKHA' LDING NAG PO LA GTOR MA 'BUL ZHING 'PHRIN LAS 'CHOL BAR 'DOD PA NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES RDO RJE MKHA' LDING NAG PO'I GTOR 'BUL DANG, 'PHRIN 'CHOL BSKUL BZLOG DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI GU GE MI TSAN GYI GRVA RIGS DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SHES RAB KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG GO ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES,
